Why NTR if Rito never done anything with the girls? He never had any kind of relationships, nothing.  Haruna said she love him and received a mutual confession. But the series ended and both never had even a simple date. Lala said she love him too, and Momo also said that too.  And...what?  Nothing more happened. And to finish this, Rito never also kissed (on purpose) anybody in the TLR history.  So, this doesn’t count as NTR for me.

Terasu, people bout to target you and steal your shit even though I'M PRETTY SURE all they boutta find is resin and waifu body pillows while you are actually just writing more doujins. Respect+, you like most of the NTR artists I've read and man, it's messed up but entertaining to read.

Or you just want to say like  "i cant believe there are other people who enjoys things that i didnt like" like fr just its a doujin but if its in real life then there is some problem.....
